content.text: This course will take 5 minutes to complete. By the end, you will have learned three key objectives:
According to Simon Sinek, there is a pattern to how leaders think, act, and communicate similarly in order to inspire action. This pattern is opposite of everyone else.
But what is this pattern?
These leaders start with WHY.
30 second video: Simon Sinek explains the power of Why.
That is correct!
“People don’t buy what you do, they buy why you do it.”

Next, Simon talks about the limbic brain. This part of the brain is responsible for our feelings.
That is correct!
The two inner circles of The Golden Circle correlate with the Limbic Brain .
